title: NVIDIA Stock Up 250% in 2025 – AI Chip Demand Explodes
shortdescription: NVDA hits $200/share as data center orders surge 300% year-over-year.
description: NVIDIA's dominance in AI accelerators continues with record Q4 earnings – analysts predict $300 target by year-end amid chip shortage.
author: Henrry Willy

title: Fed Signals December Rate Cut: Markets Rally 2% on Powell's Hints
shortdescription: Chair Jerome Powell's dovish comments spark buying frenzy across S&P 500.
description: FOMC minutes reveal 75% probability of 25bps cut – bonds yield drops, tech stocks lead surge as inflation cools to 2.1%.
author: Henrry Willy

title: Tesla Q4 Earnings Beat Expectations: Robotaxi Launch Set for June 2025
shortdescription: TSLA up 8% after-hours on autonomous driving breakthrough announcement.
description: Elon Musk reveals unsupervised FSD approval imminent – Cybercab production starts Q2, shares target $400 by analysts.
author: Henrry Willy

title: Amazon Prime Day 2025 Shatters Records: $14.2B Sales in 48 Hours
shortdescription: E-commerce giant reports 12% YoY growth, international markets drive 40% of revenue.
description: AWS cloud services hit $25B quarterly run-rate – retail margins improve 2.5% thanks to AI inventory optimization.
author: Henrry Willy

title: Gold Hits $2,800/oz All-Time High – Safe Haven Demand Surges Amid Geopolitical Tensions
shortdescription: Central banks buy record 1,200 tons as US election uncertainty fuels flight to quality.
description: GLD ETF inflows top $10B in November alone – silver follows with 15% rally, platinum up 8%.
author: Henrry Willy

title: Apple Stock Downgraded to 'Sell' After iPhone Sales Miss Q4 Estimates
shortdescription: AAPL down 5% pre-market as China market share drops to 18% from 22%.
description: Analysts cut price target to $180 – services revenue saves quarter but hardware weakness persists amid Huawei competition.
author: Henrry Willy

title: Oil Prices Crash 12% After OPEC+ Announces Surprise Production Increase
shortdescription: Brent crude falls to $68/barrel – energy stocks plunge 4% across the board.
description: Saudi Arabia leads 500K bpd hike despite Russia pushback – global recession fears intensify as US inventories swell.
author: Henrry Willy

title: S&P 500 Hits New All-Time High: Tech Stocks Drive 18% YTD Gains
shortdescription: Magnificent 7 leads rally as Fed cut expectations reach 95% probability.
description: Dow +2%, Nasdaq +3% on strong retail earnings – VIX drops to 12.5, lowest since 2023.
author: Henrry Willy
